title: 1.5.2的合成表
author: 残雪落花
txt_content:

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Rendering screen

replies.author: zjy
replies.txt_content: 内存溢出了 删掉点mod或者打开启动器设置下最佳内存
